summary: REQ-19 through REQ-22 appear largely implemented: Image B now points to /assets/IMG_5761.png via GAME_IMAGES; share flow now opens a SharePreviewScreen showing Image B with “Booo!!!” overlay and the specified reaction-time sentence; preview includes Share (calls existing shareReactionTime) and Close actions; styling uses pixelStyles and is constrained to the same max-width layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Added promotional footer/link (“Built with love using caffeine.ai”) on the new SharePreviewScreen, which was not requested as part of the share-preview requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a share-preview UI with specific image/overlay text, reaction-time sentence, and Share/Close actions; no footer or external link is mentioned.
